md:
giải nghĩa từ "shot" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Shot (noun) - Cú sút, viên đạn
	+ Meaning: A shot is an act of shooting a ball or a projectile, or a bullet or other projectile that is fired from a gun.
	+ Example: The soccer player took a shot at the goal.
	+ Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting
* Shot (verb) - Bắn, chụp
	+ Meaning: To shoot means to fire a gun or to propel a projectile, or to take a photograph.
	+ Example: The photographer shot the picture.
	+ Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting
* Shot (adjective) - Được bắn, bị thương
	+ Meaning: Something that is shot is something that has been fired from a gun or has been hit by a projectile.
	+ Example: The shot bird fell to the ground.
	+ Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting

Note: The meanings of "shot" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
html:

  • Shot (noun) - Cú sút, viên đạn
    • Meaning: A shot is an act of shooting a ball or a projectile, or a bullet or other projectile that is fired from a gun.
    • Example: The soccer player took a shot at the goal.
    • Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting
  • Shot (verb) - Bắn, chụp
    • Meaning: To shoot means to fire a gun or to propel a projectile, or to take a photograph.
    • Example: The photographer shot the picture.
    • Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting
  • Shot (adjective) - Được bắn, bị thương
    • Meaning: Something that is shot is something that has been fired from a gun or has been hit by a projectile.
    • Example: The shot bird fell to the ground.
    • Related words: shoot, shooter, shooting

Note: The meanings of "shot" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
